meanings: (중심이 되는 회사) head office, (우리 회사) this[my, our] company
report[present oneself] at the head office

vlive.korean: 있겠죠 뭔가 - S 본사의... Yes. - On SBS... 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 모아 고마워요❣
둘이 가서? - 거기? 그 본사 옆에? 옛날 - 응 옛날... Two of you went? - There? In front of the old HQ? - Yes. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : STAY의 소원을 들어주길 “바람”💨
vlive.english: Two of you went? - There? In front of the old HQ? - Yes.

vlive.korean: 옛날 본사에서 피아노 밑에 - 선생님이... At the previous agency building, under the piano... - The trainer said... 듣기 View video ITZY : 믿지 믿지!!!!!!
vlive.english: At the previous agency building, under the piano... - The trainer said...

vlive.korean: 나는 이제 본사 직원이야! I'm now an employee at HQ! 듣기 View video 달핑스튜디오 : [도시의 밤, 별] EP.02 실수는 신입사원 필수 코스
vlive.english: I'm now an employee at HQ!

vlive.korean: 어...? 본사에서 나오셨네요? Oh? Did you come from HQ? 듣기 View video 달핑스튜디오 : [도시의 밤,별] EP.05 남자가 집에 데려다 주는 이유
vlive.english: Oh? Did you come from HQ?

examples.korean: Their head office is in New York. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들의 본사는 뉴욕에 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Several companies have their headquarters in the area. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 여러 회사가 본사를 그 지역에 두고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: I’m now based at headquarters. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 지금 나는 본사에서 근무한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
